metadata.title: CVE-2019-5858 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in MacOS services integration in Google Chrome on OSX prior to 76.0.3809.87 allowed a local attacker to execute arbitrary codevia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
